law.text: Whenever a permanent injunction issues or when the case has been disposed of under KRS 233.120, the court shall allow to the attorney for the relator a reasonable fee, which shall be taxed as a part of the costs of the action.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3941m-8.
